mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ap.app_id AS app_id, p.api AS api FROM gar_users u LEFT JOIN gar_user_application ap ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_user_dept ud ON ud.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_dept rd ON rd.dept_id = ud.dept_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_permission ra ON ra.role_id = rd.role_id -- LEFT JOIN gar_permission_resource am ON am.permission_id = ra.permission_id -- LEFT JOIN gar_resources m ON m.resource_id = am.resource_id LEFT JOIN gar_permissions a ON a.permission_id = ra.permission_id LEFT JOIN gar_resources m ON m.path LIKE a.wildcard LEFT JOIN gar_resource_api mp ON mp.resource_id = m.resource_id LEFT JOIN gar_apis p ON mp.api_id = p.api_id WHERE m.status = 1 AND p.status = 1 AND p.api NOTNULL
